values: Hello!
This program is a webpage extractor developed for extracting user profile data and activity from StackOverflow website!
Type "help" to display actions and options available
This program uses StacMan and StackApps API - Please register your app and get key from
This project was developed by Ali Hanifi - Spring 2022
For more information on each command type help [command name]
KEY [your key]                               Sets your application key
SHOW [user id] [data part]                   Shows profile data by user id
SAVE [user id] [data part] [folder path]     Saves data by user id in a csv file
LIST [data part] [csv path]                  Saves data by a list of users in a csv file

KEY [your key]        Sets your application key
Parameters:
1.[your key]: StackApps provides a key to access the data, use that key here!

SHOW [user id] [data part]       Shows profile data by user id
Parameters:
1.[user id]: User Id of any user on StackoverFlow
2.[data part]: Only one of these options => {summary, reputation, comments, asnwers, questions}

SAVE [user id] [data part] [folder path]     Saves data by user id in a csv file
Parameters:
1.[user id]: User Id of any user on StackoverFlow
2.[data part]: Only one of these options => {summary, reputation, comments, asnwers, questions}
3.[folder path]: Path that you want to create the file in

LIST [data part] [csv path]      Saves data by a list of users in a csv file
Parameters:
1.[data part]: Only one of these options => {summary, reputation, comments, asnwers, questions}
2.[csv path]: Path of the file of user ids - will read first column only
Enter command:

Help command not recognized - Please enter a valid help command [key, show, save, list]! 
********************
